titleStmt.title: The holinesse of Chrisian [sic] churches, or A sermon preached at the consecration of the chappell of Sr. Iohn Baker of Sussing-herst in Cranbrooke in Kent, Baronet: upon I Cor. II. 22. By Robert Abbot, vicar of the same parish.
titleStmt.author: Abbot, Robert, 1588?-1662?

titleStmt.title: The holinesse of Chrisian [sic] churches, or A sermon preached at the consecration of the chappell of Sr. Iohn Baker of Sussing-herst in Cranbrooke in Kent, Baronet: upon I Cor. II. 22. By Robert Abbot, vicar of the same parish.
titleStmt.author: Abbot, Robert, 1588?-1662?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Paine, for P. Stephens, and C. Meredith, and are to be sold at their shop, at the signe of the Golden Lyon in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The collation is such because it fills a gap in STC 58, for which this was apparently the fifth sermon.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
